description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

DisabilityObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

DisabilityObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

DisabilityObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A unique identifier used to reference an Disability.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unique_IdentifierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unique_IdentifierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Disability_Data.description: Applicable Subjects for the Disability. Only Worker and Dependent are enabled.

Location_ContextObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Location_ContextObjectID.type: WID,  Country_Region_ID,  Country_Subregion_Code_In_Country,  Country_Subregion_Internal_ID,  ISO_3166-1_Alpha-2_Code,  ISO_3166-1_Alpha-3_Code,  ISO_3166-1_Numeric-3_Code,  ISO_3166-2_Code,  ISO_3166-2_Country-Region_Code
Location_ContextObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Location_ContextObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Disability_Data.description: The country the Disability is for.

validation.validation: Location (Country or Country Region) is required.

Disability_Data.description: If true, the Disability field is inactive. If false, the Disability field is active.

description: Encapsulating element containing all Disability data.
